creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: black front and blue heel; shoe body with blue side lining; upturned toe and lined heel flap; satin stitch embroidery on front and sides in red, pinks, greens, yellow; reinfoced sole (fabric and paper?) with heavy cord stitching throughout
title: Pair of Shoes
